column2: PY-24987/PY-22496 (probably others): Search class attributes in implicit ref resolve and 'goto symbol'

column3: I've made the changes but maybe we can do even better if we can avoid creating stubs for instance attributes entirely by getting rid of:
Inside 'PyTargetExpressionElementType'. However, I'm not sure if this is needed by any custom stub types or not.

@fitermay The stubs for instance attributes are used heavily. For example, look into PyClassImpl.findInstanceAttribute(): it comes down to PyClassImpl.getTargetExpressions(PyFunction) that finds the target expression children of the function stub.
@fitermay Thanks for your PR! I've cherry-picked it into master. It will go through QA and is likely to appear in the next major version after 2017.2.
